verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Then sings my soul,
my Savior God, to Thee,
How great Thou art!
how great Thou art!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Then sings my soul,
my Savior God, to Thee;
How great Thou art,
how great Thou art!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O Lord my God,
when I in awesome wonder
Consider all the worlds
Thy hands have made,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I see the stars, .
I hear the rolling thunder,
Thy powâ€™r thru-out
the universe displayed!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
When thru the woods
and forest glades I wander
And hear the birds sing
sweetly in the trees,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
When I look down from lofty mountain grandeur
And hear the brook
and feel the gentle breeze,

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
And when I think that God,
His Son not sparing,
Sent Him to die,
I scarce can take it in

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
That on the cross,
my burden gladly bearing,
He bled and died
to take away my sin!

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
When Christ shall come
with shout of acclamation
And take me home,
what joy shall fill my heart!

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Then I shall bow
in humble adoration
And there proclaim,
my God how great Thou art!
